tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IrrigationControl (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    device_name TEXT,
    sensor_data JSONB,
    irrigation_enabled BOOLEAN,
    last_irrigation_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    soil_moisture DECIMAL(5,2),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  measurement_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measurement_id INT,
  water_required FLOAT,
  scheduled_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (measurement_id) REFERENCES measurements(measurement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSystems (
	system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	sensor_id INT,
	sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
	status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
	data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sensor_id INT,
	temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
	humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
